name: The european federation of hand-harvested sea salt producer
goal:
Artisanal Sea Salt Europe promotes and defends the interest of its members who are hand-harvested sea salt producers.

This includes notably:

The protection of the “Fleur de sel”

The promotion and protection of sea salts with a geographical indication (PDO, PGI)

The organic sea salt production

The preservation of traditional sea salt production techniques

The protection of the salt marshes’ unique wildlife and ecosystems
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Consumers, Environment
euInitiatives:
The promotion and protection of sea salts with a geographical indication (PDO, PGI)

The organic sea salt production
